name: Pre SAT & Site Acceptance Test
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(Pre SAT & Site Acceptance Test:<* Eval(0-INT(0-(<* Eval(<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Cisco Wireless LAN Controllers)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Wireless Device Managers)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of PCAP as RAPs)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of PCAP as MAPs)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of FDAP as Routers)*>+(<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Transmitters)*>/4)+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Field Device Access Points (FDAPs))*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Wi-Fi adapters)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of FEWIO)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Mobile Stations)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of Network Switches for OneWireless)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of RADIUS Servers)*>+<*VALUE(OWS_Number of RESS servers)*>) *>))) *>)*>
